interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Anti-Puff Eye Roller, Eye Gel for Anti Dark Circles, Skin Renew Puffiness, Wrinkles and Bags - Firming And Refreshing Eye Roll - Anti Aging Eye Cream, bags and dark circle reduces,2.55oz Review Date: 2016/01/14 Store: AivmolIk Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 6.6 x 2 inches; 13.6 Ounces'} Review Text: This is such an amazing set of brushes. These brushes come enclosed in a nice case that has an individual slot holder and a flap that protects the bristles. The case can then be rolled over and tied for easy carrying and storage for your brushes. I have used all of these brushes and found that each brush seems to be soft bristles, and designed to do different makeup applications. Love each of these brushes. Although the brushes werent super saturated with makeup, I went a head and washed them to test the durability of the bristles. Once washed with a mild brush wash they dried nicely and the bristles remained soft and I had no fibers falling out of the brush. Each brush handle is wood and painted pink. Love the girly factor. Handles fit in my hand well and I had no issues with makeup application..
I received a beauty sponge. It worked well with liquid foundation application ( just remember to wet and squeeze the water out of it before using) the sponge is super absorbent so if not wet it will absorb the makeup just like any beauty sponge.
This sponge is nice and soft and washed up well also.
Overall I am very satisfied with this set of brushes. Bristles are soft and provide great makeup application. Great case for portability and for freeing up space on your makeup vanity.
I received this set of brushes for free for testing and reviewing purposes. This is my honest unbiased opinion and have come to it by using the brushes myself. Review Title: This is such an amazing set of brushes Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Real Smoothness Unrefined African Shea Butter for Skin and Hair, 16 oz Real Smoothness {'Brand': 'Real Smoothness', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '1 count', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Volume': '473 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.35 x 2.17 x 0.79 inches; 2.15 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'REALSHEA', 'UPC': '784672309981'} I am a huge fan of shea butter! I use it in several receipes as I am always making lotions, or salves. This brick of shea butter does not disappoint. It has the nutty earthy aroma which is normal for shea butter. This melted down evenly. I was able to easily blend it with other ingredients very easily. I had no issues with this product at all The best part is it came with a free bottle of lavender. Well that just gave me the go ahead to make some whipped shea butter lotion. I put the shea butter melted it down, with some coconut oil, and cocoa butter and then added about 30 drops of the lavender to make me some great lotion. All ingredients are good for the skin and will heal all dry skin issues.
I received this product for free for testing and reviewing purposes, this is my honest and unbiased opinion. This brick of shea butter does not disappoint. It has the nutty earthy aroma which is ... Akago 28 Hole Makeup Brush Tree Holder Organizer Folding Collapsible Air Drying Tower Brush Dryer QGAKAGO {'Special Feature': 'Portable, Foldable', 'Brand': 'QGAKAGO', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Package Type': 'Standard Packaging', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Mounting Type Tabletop Mount': '', '': 'Item Weight 0.4 Pounds', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 5.9 x 1.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CA014', 'UPC': '736950050511'} I am a makeup junkie and I can tell you the worst thing about wearing makeup is cleaning the brushes. Usually when I clean my brushes I clean them all at one time creating a huge mess and taking up my whole counter area as they are laying out to dry. This brush holder works like a charm and is very compact. It is very easy to assemble just connect the legs and its good to go. This hold 28 brushes so it works great for me. As I can fill it in no time. There are different slots for different brushes. It holds the brushes well and in place and I think because of them being upside down makes them dry faster and help hold their shape. Love this new tool and now I dont dread cleaning my brushes any longer.
I received this brush holder for free for testing and reviewing purposes. This is my honest unbiased opinion and have come to it by using the holder myself. ... a makeup junkie and I can tell you the worst thing about wearing makeup is cleaning the brushes 10 Metallic Plus 2 White Henna Tattoo Sheets - 129+ Temporary Flash Tattoos for Woman & Girls in White, Gold, Silver & Turquoise (Wild & Free Collection) LUKYUS {'Brand': 'LUKYUS', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '129', 'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 5.5 x 0.2 inches; 1.6 Ounces'} Great temporary tattoos. My daughter and her friend had a blast playing with these tattoos. They were easy to apply. Just like every temporary tattoo and the designs are vibrant and well colored. Seemed to stay on the skin well and I had no issues with the temporary tattoos at all.
I am satisfied with the tattoos.
I received a discount for testing and reviewing purposes. This is my honest unbiased opinion and have come to it by inspecting the tattoos myself. Great temporary tattoos Pack of 25 Elastic Ribbon Hair Ties - No Crease Ouchless Ponytail Holders Hair Accessories (Variety Colors) Styla Hair {'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Styla Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Item Weight': '0.05 Pounds', 'Number of Pieces': '25', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 3.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.8 Ounces'} Great bands for hair. The are easier on the hair than standard rubber bands. However if you have super thick hair these may not work for you. These are very nice and colorful and work well in thinneer hair.
I have no complaints with these hair ties.
They work as they should
I received a discount for testing and reviewing purposes. This is my honest unbiased opinion and have come to it by using myself. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for natural skincare products, favoring nourishing ingredients like shea butter, and enjoys engaging in DIY skincare by crafting personalized lotions and salves. Their appreciation for sensory experiences drives their choice of products, particularly those with earthy aromas, alongside a holistic interest in complementary elements such as lavender.

Recent interactions have highlighted the user's passion for makeup, particularly in maintaining and cleaning their tools, which reflects a practical approach that harmonizes skincare and makeup application. Their commitment to quality and utility underscores their dedication to effective beauty practices.

Additionally, the user exhibits an interest in playful beauty elements, including temporary tattoos, showcasing a willingness to explore creative self-expression. Their experiences with vibrant and easy-to-apply products indicate a desire for enjoyment in their self-care rituals.

The latest interaction reveals the user's appreciation for high-quality makeup tools that enhance their beauty routine. Their focus on functional, stylish accessories, combined with a commitment to easy maintenance, enriches their holistic approach.

Overall, the user embodies a health-conscious mindset, prioritizing sustainable and enjoyable beauty rituals that emphasize sensory pleasure, effective natural solutions, and a blend of practicality and playfulness in their self-care routine. This evolving profile reflects their dedication to enhancing overall well-being through diverse beauty practices.
